releaseNotes:
This update includes:

1. A polished UI and smoother overall usability.
2. Bug fixes and stability improvements for a better experience.
description:
Don't invest unless you're prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high-risk investment, and you should not expect to be protected if something goes wrong.
Take 2 mins to learn more.

Unlock the world of Bitcoin and cryptocurrency trading with Bybit

Join over 78 million users to experience a straightforward, intuitive and organised cryptocurrency trading journey. Manage your Bitcoin (BTC) and crypto portfolio through our user-centric and innovative platform. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced trader, or eyeing Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Solana (SOL) or other major cryptocurrencies, we offer a streamlined trading experience.

Each of these cryptoassets comes with individual risks, such as significant price swings, liquidity variations, and differing levels of technological maturity.

Bitcoin and crypto trading

Our mission is to make the process of accessing cryptocurrencies more user-centric, helping you explore assets such as Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Ripple (XRP), Solana (SOL), Cardano (ADA), Chainlink (LINK), Polkadot (DOT), PEPE, Litecoin (LTC), Dogecoin (DOGE) and Hedera (HBAR). Trade Spot markets on Bybit.

Each of these cryptoassets comes with individual risks, such as significant price swings, liquidity variations, and differing levels of technological maturity.

Our trading features
- Spot trading: Use tools like Take Profit/Stop Loss (TP/SL) to support your trading strategy.
- Crypto trading: Capture opportunities in crypto markets through a smooth and intuitive interface.
- Large trades & positions tracking: Monitor high-value Bitcoin (BTC) and cryptocurrency transactions with timely, real-time updates.

Why choose Bybit for your cryptocurrency trades?

Near-Instant crypto trading
Trade a wide range of cryptocurrencies - including Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Ripple (XRP), Solana (SOL), PEPE and others - using credit cards, bank transfers or supported payment methods.

Trading these assets involves risks including market volatility and loss of value.

Optimised experience
Our streamlined UX supports a clear and organised Spot trading experience across assets such as Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Solana (SOL), and more.

Deposits and transfers
Transfer cryptocurrencies - including Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Solana (SOL), and Ripple (XRP) - in real-time across supported wallets with full customisation options.

As with all crypto transactions, blockchain congestion and network conditions may impact processing times.

Portfolio diversification
Explore a broad range of supported cryptocurrencies - including Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Ripple (XRP), Solana (SOL), PEPE and more - on Spot markets.

All cryptoassets carry individual risks, and diversification does not guarantee protection from loss.

Our official channels

Bybit Help: https://bybit.com/en-GB/help-center
